data.title: Benefit Partners
data.text:
BoardSource

BoardSource offers a range of tools and services designed to enhance your board’s effectiveness. CalNonprofits’ members enjoy a 15% discount on the Board Support Program, featuring monthly educational webinars, a collaborative platform, an Ask-an-Expert email service, downloadable resources, and more. Plus, save $426 on the Board Self-Assessment Tool.

CalNonprofits Insurance Services

CalNonprofits Insurance Services (CNIS), a CalNonprofits subsidiary, is the only California brokerage specializing in insurance for nonprofits. CNIS insures more than 1,800 nonprofit organizations throughout the state, from start-ups to larger, established organizations. Available to Nonprofit, Foundation, and Associate members only

List your position on the CalNonprofits Job Board! We’ll help you get the right person by putting your opening in front of qualified candidates. CalNonprofits members get 50% off the regular price.

Community Bank of the Bay

Community Bank of the Bay is a mission-driven bank recognized by the US Treasury for its commitment to communities. With a focus on relationship banking, they provide customized financial solutions for nonprofits and businesses, including Community Impact Checking and Savings Accounts, Lines of Credit, Term Loans, and more.

Dharma Merchant Services

Dharma Merchant Services saves you hundreds of dollars in fees if you process $2000 or more on credit cards each month. You can accept payments in person with a terminal, on your smartphone or tablet, or online.

Elevation

With over 15 years of experience exclusively serving the nonprofit sector, Elevation is at the forefront of helping nonprofits enhance their online presence. They offer affordable, industry-leading solutions in website design, marketing, and branding that are tailor-made for mission-driven organizations. Whether your needs are launching your first website, strategizing your email campaigns, or assisting with your Google Ad Grant, Elevation has a range of reasonably-priced solutions to achieve your goals. In addition to their unparalleled services, Elevation extends a professional courtesy to members of Calnonprofits, granting them an exclusive 10% discount. Additionally, for those interested in leveraging the $10,000 Google Ad Grant, they provide comprehensive assistance with the application process.

Great Kolor

Great Kolor offers printing and placement of ads on buses, in train stations and on outdoor kiosks across California. The consulting fee is waived for members who also receive quarterly email updates on low-cost/no cost public service ad space availability.

HoneyBee

HoneyBee is a Certified Benefit Corporation designed to get your employees financially fit. With Honeybee, you can give your workforce access to no-cost rainy day funds paired with on-demand bilingual financial coaches to help them reach their financial goals. All setup fees (ranging from $500 to $2,500 depending on org size) will be waived for CalNonprofits members!

Mineral

Members get a free subscription to Mineral, an HR platform that offers an online library of compliance information and training, an interactive employee handbook builder, and a hotline to tap their HR experts.

Available only for Nonprofit and Foundation members

OPD Business Solutions

ODP Business Solutions (formerly Office Depot) provides CalNonprofits members up to 55% off on office supplies, furniture, cleaning & breakroom products, free shipping on orders of $20 or more, and up to 40% savings on copy & print needs.

Pocket Security

Pocket Security, Inc. is a one-stop shop for all of your cyber security needs. CalNonprofits members get a 15% discount on cyber security education, programming, and services.

Available only for Nonprofit and Foundation members

Purchasing Point

PurchasingPoint is an exclusive discount program for CalNonprofits members that leverages group buying power to access significant savings on your everyday vendors. PurchasingPoint can save 30%, on average, on goods and services with over 200 vendors in the program, including FedEx, Staples, Pitney Bowes, Enterprise, and more.

Available only for Nonprofit and Foundation members

Savi

CalNonprofits members managing student debt can access a personalized repayment calculator and support from student loan experts with Savi, an online public benefit corporation that helps employees navigate the complexities of repayment and loan forgiveness options. CalNonprofits members enjoy free as well as paid subscriptions at a discounted rate.

The Nonprofit Quarterly (NPQ)

NPQ is an independent news outlet serving the civil sector, including nonprofit leaders and activists, for over 15 years. Members receive a $10 discount on annual subscriptions, available for both new and renewing subscribers

UST

UST offers cost-saving programs designed to improve cash flow, mitigate risk, ensure HR compliance, and add operational efficiencies so you can do more to impact your local communities. Whether your primary focus is to protect your assets, ensure compliance, reduce unemployment costs, or to build a thriving work culture to keep your employees engaged, UST has a solution for you. CalNonprofits members receive a complimentary 2-Year Unemployment Savings Projection and exclusive nonprofit content and state-specific news.
